verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> sim set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הַ֣ר <WH2022> har against mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> se-'Ir; Seir וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. against

וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <WH559> ve-'a-Mar-ta And say לּ֗וֹ lo, כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar unto it Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha I am against הַר־ <WH2022> har- Behold O mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> se-'Ir; Seir וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> ve-na-Ti-ti I [am] against thee and I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> ya-Di mine hand עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha, against וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha against thee and I will make שְׁמָמָ֥ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah desolate וּמְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <WH4923> u-me-sham-Mah. thee most

עָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5892> 'a-Rei-cha thy cities חָרְבָּ֣ה <WH2723> cha-re-Bah waste אָשִׂ֔ים <WH7760> 'a-Sim, I will lay וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah and thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh; will become וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <WH3045> ve-ya-da'-Ta and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, Because הֱי֤וֹת <WH1961> he-Yot have had לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֵיבַ֣ת <WH342> 'ei-Vat hatred עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> o-Lam, Because thou hast had a perpetual וַתַּגֵּ֥ר <WH5064> vat-tag-Ger and hast shed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- [the blood of] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto יְדֵי־ <WH3027> ye-dei- by the force חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> Cha-rev; of the sword בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> be-'Et in the time אֵידָ֔ם <WH343> 'ei-Dam, of their calamity בְּעֵ֖ת <WH6256> be-'Et in the time עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> 'a-Von [that their] iniquity קֵֽץ׃ <WH7093> Ketz. [had] an end

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen therefore חַי־ <WH2416> chai- Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, GOD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לְדָ֥ם <WH1818> le-Dam thee unto blood אֶעֶשְׂךָ֖ <WH6213> 'e-'es-Cha I will prepare וְדָ֣ם <WH1818> ve-Dam and blood יִרְדֲּפֶ֑ךָ <WH7291> yir-da-Fe-cha; shall pursue אִם־ <WH518> 'im- thee sith לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not דָ֛ם <WH1818> dam blood שָׂנֵ֖אתָ <WH8130> sa-Ne-ta thou hast not hated וְדָ֥ם <WH1818> ve-Dam even blood יִרְדֲּפֶֽךָ׃ <WH7291> yir-da-Fe-cha. shall pursue

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti Thus will I make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֣ר <WH2022> har mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> se-'Ir, Seir לְשִֽׁמְמָ֖ה <WH8077> le-shim-Mah most וּשְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> u-she-ma-Mah; desolate וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Ti and cut off מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu who עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver from it him that passeth out וָשָֽׁב׃ <WH7725> va-Shav. and him that returneth

וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <WH4390> u-mil-le-Ti And I will fill אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרָ֖יו <WH2022> ha-Rav his mountains חֲלָלָ֑יו <WH2491> cha-la-Lav; with his slain גִּבְעוֹתֶ֤יךָ <WH1389> giv-'o-Tei-cha [men] in thy hills וְגֵאוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1516> ve-ge-'o-Tei-cha and in thy valleys וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all אֲפִיקֶ֔יךָ <WH650> 'a-fi-Kei-cha, and in all thy rivers חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> chal-lei- that are slain חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev with the sword יִפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> yip-pe-Lu shall they fall בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

שִֽׁמְמ֤וֹת <WH8077> shim-Mot desolations עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> o-Lam thee perpetual אֶתֶּנְךָ֔ <WH5414> 'et-ten-Cha, I will make וְעָרֶ֖יךָ <WH5892> ve-'a-Rei-cha and thy cities לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not; תֵישַׁבְנָה tei-shav-nah כתָשֹׁ֑בְנָה <WH3427> ta-Shoe-nah; abide קוִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because אֲ֠מָרְךָ <WH559> 'A-ma-re-cha Because thou hast said אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> she-Nei These two הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֧י <WH8147> she-Tei and these two הָאֲרָצ֛וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot countries לִ֥י li תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <WH1961> tih-Yei-nah become וִֽירַשְׁנ֑וּהָ <WH3423> vi-rash-Nu-ha; shall be mine and we will possess וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh it whereas the LORD שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> sham was there הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> ha-Yah. become

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen therefore חַי־ <WH2416> chai- Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֮ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti, I will even do כְּאַפְּךָ֙ <WH639> ke-'ap-pe-Cha according to thine anger וּכְקִנְאָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH7068> u-che-kin-'A-te-cha, and according to thine envy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשִׂ֔יתָה <WH6213> 'a-Si-tah, which thou hast used מִשִּׂנְאָתֶ֖יךָ <WH8135> mis-sin-'a-Tei-cha out of thy hatred בָּ֑ם Bam; וְנוֹדַ֥עְתִּי <WH3045> ve-no-Da'-ti against them and I will make myself known בָ֖ם vam כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which אֶשְׁפְּטֶֽךָ׃ <WH8199> 'esh-pe-Te-cha. among them when I have judged

וְֽיָדַעְתָּ֮ <WH3045> ve-ya-da'-Ta And thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי׀ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti [and that] I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נָאָֽצוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH5007> na-'a-tzo-Tei-cha, all thy blasphemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָמַ֛רְתָּ <WH559> 'a-Mar-ta which thou hast spoken עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> ha-Rei against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֣ר׀ <WH559> le-Mor saying; שָׁמֵמָה sha-me-mah כשָׁמֵ֑מוּ <WH8074> sha-Me-mu; make amazed קלָ֥נוּ <WH99999> La-nu נִתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> nit-te-Nu they are given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> le-'och-Lah us to consume

וַתַּגְדִּ֤ילוּ <WH1431> vat-tag-Di-lu ye have boasted עָלַי֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lai against בְּפִיכֶ֔ם <WH6310> be-fi-Chem, Thus with your mouth וְהַעְתַּרְתֶּ֥ם <WH6280> ve-ha'-tar-Tem against me and have multiplied עָלַ֖י <WH5921> 'a-Lai against דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1697> div-rei-Chem; your words אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH8085> sha-Ma-'e-ti. against me I have heard ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD כִּשְׂמֹ֙חַ֙ <WH8055> kis-Mo-ach rejoiceth כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, When the whole earth שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah thee desolate אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> 'e-'e-seh- I will make לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

כְּשִׂמְחָ֨תְךָ֜ <WH8057> ke-sim-Cha-te-cha As thou didst rejoice לְנַחְלַ֧ת <WH5159> le-nach-Lat at the inheritance בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַ֥ל <WH5921> 'al and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- it שָׁמֵ֖מָה <WH8074> sha-Me-mah because it was desolate כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken so אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> 'e-'e-seh- so will I do לָּ֑ךְ Lach; שְׁמָמָ֨ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah unto thee thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become הַר־ <WH2022> har- O mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> se-'Ir Seir וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> e-Dom and all Idumea כֻּלָּ֔הּ <WH3605> kul-Lah, all וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U [even] all of it and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh
